channel.title: [guide] How to join rs and other things!
channel.description:
[center][b][size=15pt]-=How to join Runescape=-[/size] [/b]
[b] Step 1 . Go To [url=http://www.runescape.com]Runescape[/url] Step 2 . If you are on homepage click on this button :
[IMG]http://i124.photobucket.com/albums/p8/svenimen/Step1.jpg[/img]
Step 3 . Then you will see :
[IMG]http://i124.photobucket.com/albums/p8/svenimen/step2.jpg[/img]
[u][b]"Please indicate your age"[/b][/u]
On that one you need to select your age .
[u]"Please select your permanent country of residence"[/u]
On That one you need to select your country .
Step 4 . Then click on "[u]Submit[/u]"
Step 5 . If you did that you would see this :
[IMG]http://i124.photobucket.com/albums/p8/svenimen/Step3.jpg[/img]
On "[u]Desired Username:[/u]" You need to type your Name that you want .
If you did that click on "[u]Check Availbility[/u]" If the username is already in use then you need to make try a other name.
Step 6 . On the next page you would see a whole text with agreements ect .. Just scroll down and press : "[u]I Agree[/u]"
Step 7 . If you pressed "[u]I Agree[/u]" then you would see this :
[IMG]http://i124.photobucket.com/albums/p8/svenimen/step4.jpg[/img]
On : "[u]Desired Password:[/u]" you need to type your password under that you would see "[u]Confirm Password:[/u]" then you need to put the [u]SAME[/u] pass as you did before.
Then click on The button and then play Runescape !.
[hr]
[b][size=15pt]-= Chat Things : =-[/size]
See video :
[URL=http://s124.photobucket.com/albums/p8/svenimen/?action=view&current=clip0025.flv][IMG]http://i124.photobucket.com/albums/p8/svenimen/th_clip0025.jpg[/img][/URL]
[hr]
[b][size=15pt]-= Help Site's =-[/size]
[url=http://www.lunagang.nl/]Lunagang A Dutch help site[/url] [url=http://www.tip.it/runescape/]Tip.It[/url] [url=http://www.runehq.com/]RuneHq[/url] [url=http://www.roenskeep.net/]RoensKeep A Dutch help site[/url] [url=http://www.rspagina.nl/]Rs Page - Dutch-French or English[/url]
[hr]
[b]more to come !
I typed it myself !

item.title: [guide] How to join rs and other things!
item.dc:creator: @0wn3d_n00b Ooo Java
item.description:
@0wn3d_n00b wrote:

Mr.Chris:

Surely the creating an account guide is self explanatory on the actual site anyway. Also, your first guide is flawed. If someone didn’t how to create an account on RuneScape, why would they be here?

Owned?
Also it does say all the stages on the runescape website, its 100% noob friendly…kinda good work though.

Read full topic

item.title: [guide] How to join rs and other things!
item.dc:creator: @svenimen_s Melissa T
item.description:
@svenimen_s wrote:

[center][size=15pt]-=How to join Runescape=-[/size]

[b]
Step 1 . Go To Runescape
Step 2 . If you are on homepage click on this button :

Step 3 . Then you will see :

step2.jpg800×335

“Please indicate your age”

On that one you need to select your age .

“Please select your permanent country of residence”

On That one you need to select your country .

Step 4 . Then click on “Submit”

Step 5 . If you did that you would see this :

Step3.jpg770×497

On “Desired Username:” You need to type your Name that you want .

If you did that click on “Check Availbility”
If the username is already in use then you need to make try a other name.

Step 6 . On the next page you would see a whole text with agreements ect …
Just scroll down and press : “I Agree”

Step 7 . If you pressed “I Agree” then you would see this :

step4.jpg800×335

On : “Desired Password:” you need to type your password under that you would see “Confirm Password:” then you need to put the SAME pass as you did before.

Then click on The button and then play Runescape !.

[hr]

[b][size=15pt]-= Chat Things : =-[/size]

See video :

[hr]

[b][size=15pt]-= Help Site’s =-[/size]

Lunagang A Dutch help site
Tip.It
RuneHq
RoensKeep A Dutch help site
Rs Page - Dutch-French or English

[hr]

[b]more to come !

I typed it myself !
